bibl.title: Scribes and Scholars. A Guide to the Transmission of Greek and Latin Literature. Fourth Edition.
bibl.note: 1e éd.: 1968; - 3e éd.: 1991. - Takes into account the advances made in the subject over the past 20 years with updated notes and minor amendments to the text.
bibl.seg: L.D. Reynolds † & N.G. Wilson, Scribes and Scholars. A Guide to the Transmission of Greek and Latin Literature. Fourth Edition.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2013, 8°, ix-325 pp. et XVI pll. ISBN 978-0-19-968633-9. £30.99.
1e éd.: 1968; - 3e éd.: 1991. - Takes into account the advances made in the subject over the past 20 years with updated notes and minor amendments to the text.
C.R. par S.P. Oakley, CR N.S., 65 (2015) pp. 618-619.
